description: [Raspberry Robin](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1130) will drop a copy of itself to a subfolder in %Program Data% or %Program Data%\\Microsoft\\ to attempt privilege elevation and defense evasion if not running in Session 0.(Citation: TrendMicro RaspberryRobin 2022)

external_references.description: Christopher So. (2022, December 20). Raspberry Robin Malware Targets Telecom, Governments. Retrieved May 17, 2024.
